values:
Back at it. 

School. 


Winter holiday just never seems long enough.

So. It's been a while. Naturally, it's another late night, and I am having the same breakdown I've been having for the last five months. By now, everyone is tired of listening...alas, I have turned elsewhere to find a means of release. Sad. The basis of these breakdowns: love..obvi. And committment. I always thought I was totally open to the idea... I was the girl searching for the guy who was willing to commit to me...Right? =( It really sucks to be on the outside looking in, now realizing what was really going on the last couple years of my love life; to finally see, all too late, that the man of my dreams was by my side through thick and thin-a best friend. Let's say his name was Pete. Pete and I met my first year of college. He was soooo brilliant. Our friendship immediately took off like a rocket...and seemed to be one that would withstand anything. After a while, Pete confessed his love for me...We dated for a couple months...I ended it. We remained friends, and he'd frequently tell me his feelings for me remained the same. I knew as time passed that I was falling in love with him, but would never pursue a relationship, because of ridiculous reasons I'd convince myself to believe... This past summer, I went to Australia. While I was there, in a country across the world from home, I found myself wishing one person were there with me- Pete. While the trip overall was spectacular, each night I'd lay in bed and think about him. If only *he* were there, the trip would be absolutely perfect. I thought it over and finally decided that I'd gather up all my nerve and tell him how I felt when I returned home-tell him that I want nothing more than to be his. Tell him that all the while, I knew he was -perfect- for me, and the only thing keeping me from him was my committment issue--I knew that if I were to end up with him, it'd be for forever...and that scared me...that's why I ended our initial try at a relationship. Ugh I was so silly. And ready to admit it and end our separation. Naturally, I return from Australia, only to find that he has a new girlfriend. Fuck. Now I am in a whirlwind of questions and emotions and anxiety and confusion. And regret. Did he ever really love me? I mean, he did hang around a couple years...am I just out of luck? Obviously he'd move on, right? But the thing that gets me is, since he has gotten this new girlfriend, our friendship has been shot to hell. He hasn't even personally told me about the new girl--damn facebook. (= We hardly ever talk, haven't seen each other in the last 5 months...we aren't friends...Pete has erased me from his life. So, now I'm feeling like our friendship meant absolutely nothing to him...after we broke up the first time, he said how he still wanted to be friends...that my friendship meant more to him...was it a lie? Was he only sticking around, acting as a friend in attempt to see if we would start a relationship again? I have always been terrible with timing, but this just kills me. Now all the bloody 'What if's' and 'What could have been's' are racing through my head, and I can't take it. I miss him. So badly. My friends told me to give him space--that he was just avoiding me to get over me...So I did...but now, I don't know if I could even bear to see him..knowing he is in love with another girl..My heart couldn't take it. I would not be able to keep my composure. Oh, what do i do??? Now the only 'advice' coming my way is 'Get over it'. If only it were that easy. How do I do it? How do I say goodbye? I love Pete. I love -Andrew- Ugh. Happy Christmas, all.

I love the movie Equilibrium. And Christian Bale. Bleh. It gives me hope that there are perks to feeling.
As it is, I wonder who controls the world...How we act, how we feel. I don't think emotion should be allowed. I'm just another victim in the horrible game- one of lies, cowardice, misunderstanding. What's the point?
Do small moments of pure happiness or love truly predominate all the pain? I cannot believe that this is the case...
Even still, I am dying for someone to prove me wrong.

I travel through periods of strong elation, and undesirable depression. I'm not bipolar or anything, it's just that I have a lot of good things in my life, but a lot of crap, too. You know how people say, oh you have money, or you have two parents that love you, or you have friends, what right do you have to be depressed? It's the standard. It's trying to be what everyone else wants me to be. It's being so stressed out that you can't let go of anything anymore. It just stays with you, until it all builds up and you feel like you want to explode. Yeah. Sometimes I love my life, and, yes I thank God for all the wonderful things in it. But other times it hurts so bad, and I cry, and beg Him to make my life different. Change it. Erase my memories. Just put it all away. I wrote an essay today for a scholarship...The topic was "If you could have one 'do-over' in life, what would it be?" Naturally, this shoved me into a pool of past decisions which I try so hard to forget, and a never ending list of 'what ifs'. What if I never ended up going to the U of A? What if I took out a student loan and moved to Oregon, Texas, or California? What if I worked harder, went to all my classes? What if I decided to hold on to my virginity all those years ago? What if I didn't go out of my way to piss my dad off? What if Andrew and I were still together? What if I never cheated on Jay...? Fuck it. I guess I've learned you can't dwell on those what ifs...it'll only eat you alive. They say you shouldn't regret anything-that it all shapes who you are and who you've become...
Well what if I don't like the person I have become?
(heh..what if..lame..)

I'm so hard for a rich girl My heels are high, my eyes cast low And I don't know how to love I get so tired after midday, lately I take it out on my good friends But the worst stays in, or where would I begin?
My office glows all night long Its a nuclear show, and the stars are gone Elevator, Elevator, take me home
I'm so hot for the rich girl Her heels so high, and my hopes so low 'Cause I don't know how to love I'll take her home after midnight And if she likes, I'll tell her lies How we'll be in love by the morning I don't think she knows That I'm saying good bye
My office glows all night long Its a nuclear show, and the stars are gone Elevator, Elevator, take me home
My office glows all night long Its a nuclear show, and the stars are gone Elevator, Elevator, take me home
Don't go, say you'll stay Spend a lazy Sunday In my arms, I won't take Anything away
Don't go, say you'll stay Spend a lazy Sunday In my arms, don't take Anything away

...Happy Birthday, Jay.
Sigh.

Who Creates the Monsters? 
 
The horrific, senseless massacre of innocent college students in Virginia leaves me speechless, helpless and confused on how another human being could destroy lives and families with such ambitious hatred. How can someone murder with such ease and apathy? 

It really was a shitty ass day. 
I have so much to say. So many events to describe and rant on. 
But tonight I just don't have the energy to do it. 

I'm in a weird mood. 

Holding my breath. Moving closer and closer to tumbling off the edge.

I just want a hand to hold.

And even if they have to run away
She's gonna marry that boy some day...

Is love like a faucet?  Can it just be turned off with the flick of a wrist, by a single event?  Is pain enough to make you stop loving?

It can't be that way can it?  How do you go through life then?  Just hopeless.  Why do things have to be so difficult.  I always thought that when life fell into its appropriate place, it would be easy.  But maybe it's just a competition of who can hold on the longest.

"I am so in love with you." That's what he said. And now I just don't know.  I'm hurt and angry and upset and just confused even more.  I suppose I was under the understanding that real love could overcome anything.  I will be the first to admit that I made mistakes, I hurt you; but I really loved. I still do. So again I find myself sitting here, realizing you never -loved- me.  Honesty--probably one of the few positive aspects I had to offer you.  Hard as it was, I was honest enough to tell you all the shitty details. Honest enough to admit guilt. Honest enough to accept the consequences. All along, the only lie was that you loved me.

Dammit. All I've ever wanted is to feel like something and now I just feel more generic.  Where is the shoulder to cry on?  Where is the "I'll always be there for you" mentality?  Nonexistant I guess.  Maybe I've just been crying too much lately. 

    I'm hardening on the inside.  Protecting myself, because sharing your secrets doesn't get you anywhere.  You know what?  I am getting better.  I don't feel, I just go about my life.  I'm not afraid to be alone, or scared.  I'm a rock.  Unbreakable, unshakeable.  Imperfection at its best.  Perfection in itself.  My blood spills across the floor and it's just another coat of paint.  A dull brown, already without breath or oxygen.  Pure.  Clean.  Purged of all sin and recycled for more use.

Drained and redrained.

Ah. It's been a tiring couple weeks. I saw the play 'Rent' last night. Blew me away. and so did my date. =)

So instead of updating on all the crap that's going on and allowing myself to reflect on how much things have sucked, I'll post some of my favorite lines from the play.


Mimi: There's only us, There's only this, Forget regret, Or life is yours to miss, No other road, No other way, No day but today. 



Mark, Roger: I don't own emotion, I rent. =]



Mark: The opposite of war isn't peace! 
Joanne: What is? 
Mark: It's CREATION! 



Maureen: All you had to do was ask, and I'm yours.  =]



Collins, Angel: I think they meant it when they said you can't buy love. Now I know you can rent it, a new lease you are my love - on life... be my life. 



Maureen: Take me for what I am, who I was meant to be. And if you give a damn, then take me baby, or leave me!



Mimi: Give in to love or live in fear.  



Mark: How do you document real life when real life's getting more like fiction each day? 


&& "Pookie!" heh.

Strength.  Not measured by how much weight you can lift, or how many muscles you have. 

 

Strength is your ability to stand tall when the rest of the world is crumbling around you.




Stand with me?

I figure I'm a lot like Bridget Jones.

Only, I'm afraid my story won't have a happy ending.

How do you save something you might have entirely screwed up?

Bridget Jones: You think you've found the right man, but there's so much wrong with him, and then he finds out there's so much wrong with you, and then it all just falls apart.

"I think I found your diary...did you lose one around University and Stone?"

I can't point any fingers. But the hunch still burns in my chest, and I cannot help but feel completely violated.  Curious fingers can so easily deceive you, and in a second, you can be stripped of the only real personal thing you possess- your thoughts. your feelings. 

So this is what you wanted? 

I'll make it easier for you to poke around at the twisted details of my life.

Enjoy.

ok so I have a few rants for tonight. 

As I sit here, engrossed in my own personal two liter bottle of Dr. Pepper, and five terribly delicious chocolate chip cookies...

Life isn't as simple as yes or no.  They say a kiss is worth a thousand words, but maybe a touch is worth even more.  A kiss can mean every number of certain things, but a touch is always open for consideration.  I wish people stopped wanting definite answers.  Am I not aloud to be unsure about something or do I have to stand firm?   Am I not aloud to be confused or to mull something over, choose my words, think before I speak?

Maybe some people take friendship too personal. Acquaintances unknowingly become best friends and best friends secretly become lovers.  Nothing stays as it should and as much as you try to ignore the changes, they eventually slap you in the face.

So the time comes to make a decision and you're still reeling.  Still confused, still wondering.  And in the end more people get hurt.  Funny how that works.

And sometimes emotions don't matter.  You can love someone for all the wrong reasons, fight for them and in the end, have nothing.  So you stick with currency.  Emotions don't matter.  Some things just aren't meant to be, and theres no use hanging on just to be let down. 

But with this mentality, bad decisions are made, and it's not til after you look at the scattered pieces which have broken as a result, that you realize what's really been done.  And so some view you in ways that might be completely skewed.  

A whore. Seems to be the reputation I am giving off as of late. Meh, I'm not a whore. Talk it up. Try to break me.  I might have made some misguided decisions, but they certainly don't alter my true feelings, nor do they have any bearing on declaring me a whore.  It's funny how reputation can precede you and have no bearing on how you really live your life. =]

 Sometimes we just do things to get a reaction.  A shocked gasp or a sympathetic hug or some showing of emotion.  I'm drunk on Dr. Pepper (yes I am indeed wild as all hell),  and I'm calling you.  And you'll probably laugh at me and ask questions I don't want to answer.  And it will be my turn to laugh it off. 

I went to a wedding today. It's scary. To think that in 5 or so years, I could be married?! Thrust out into the 'real world'.  I can barely take care of myself, how am I going to make it out there? 

 I guess I'm more calm, cool, and collected on the outside.  No one will be able to tell how much I'm panicking. 

I'm on the wrong side of a bullet going to fast for me to see it coming.  It will take me out and no one will notice.  Isn't that the saddest thing ever?  I could dissapear, and I wonder how long it would take for someone to care enough to look. 

How pathetic.

Is there such a thing as comfortable?  Being in a relationship of sorts and being comfortable?  Maybe.  But is that such a bad thing?

When you love someone does everyday need to be like some rollercoaster ride?  I don't think so. 

Its enough of a thrill to see them.  Those funny little embarrasing butterflies you get.  When you can't help but smile.  Can change your mood even when you are feeling like all you want to do is sink into a hole and fade away.  They give you enough of a reason to wake up in the morning. 

When you are surrounded by a world that you dislike, maybe even hate, a little bit of love helps you survive.

Its like...every day is a ridiculous struggle with reality and imagination.  Cynnicism and hypocracy.  And I hate it.  This place....all the rules. 

It takes all of me to smile and laugh and be happy, I can act like everything is perfect.  But its sad how I can't handle what I've gotten myself into.  How long can I sit here and pretend that I love this life?  I'm drifting away, just moving through the walk of life.  So far away.  The cold gun of reality.

I'm sorry I'm like this.  A huge mistake.  Constantly cold and dissatisfied with my life.  This place is crushing me, I can feel it.  Complicates things because it makes me feel...lost, or maybe alone. 

No one has ever offered to save me before.  Its never been an option.

I love you.  I don't want to look back.  I keep looking for answers and I don't think I'll ever find them.  I'm changing and running and smiling more and more and I think its because you care about me.

I can say goodbye to a past, and to all these worries.  Color myself white and just love.  Because you make me happy.

I'm in love with love.  Its above any level I've ever experienced.  Maybe a little weird.  Off sometimes.  Amazing.

But no matter how you put it, love manages to contort any situation.  People say "love blinds us."  Maybe.  Its like closing your eyes and trusting in complete irrationality.  Finally starting to see, without seeing anything at all.

Crazy.  Last night I walked through the cold, pulling my hands into my sleeves for warmth.  Sharp intakes of breath, gritting my teeth against the frosted air.  A clouded night sky offered overhead protection.  A few bright stars managed to shine through the haze. 

On my way to you.  Enbittered, feeling the cold inside and out.  Ready to be stone, even for no reason but to spark emotion.  Silent anger bubbling inside.  Faultless, painless, worthless.  And looking up those stars above provide reason.  Their moronic twinkling through the clouds, not taunting, but enlightening, maybe lightening. 

Today, I live day to day.  Life is one big chain reaction, funny little emotions.  I want to fall, because sometimes the consequences of your actions are just part of some game.  Toys, pegs to fill holes.  So why not live for now?  I want to surrender, admit that I'm wrapped around your finger and smile.  I want to take chances, because its exillarating...because its fun.  Why not? 

I want to laugh with you every day, and cry when you leave me. 

You can wish that moments last forever, but sometimes its hopeless.  So you walk away hips swaying in time to some song playing through a window.  Sexy and quick.  Reflective.  Picks you up, deliberate steps, quick movements, heel to high heel.  Tingling in pure illusion, just moving to the beat.  Moving with a purpose, smiling to yourself in cool memory.

Embarrassment is always a bad way to start an already uncomfortable evening.  An evening, an afternoon, a day.  A tumbling story crashing through the dark.  Like a love just beyond your reach.  Memories fade and all that remains are photographs.  "Good times" that once existed and now are just stories of the past.  When you can't remember anymore and you don't want to exist in the present.  A sort of numbness that you really wish would just die.  But it can't and it won't.  So you become a fake sort of superman, changing faces and identities in a telephone booth of reality.  Hiding in dark corners desperately trying to transcend time. 

Faster than a speeding bullet won't save you here.

Maybe its the ending that matters, not the trials along the way and surely not the "past' that you thought was filled with wonder and amazement.  Everything fades away and its just a depressing fact of life. 

Numb just trying to forget and remember and figure out just what in the hell you are doing with your life.  Yanked and torn, stolen away and never whole.  Thats life.  A hellish mix of emotions and uncertainty.  No trust.  No love. 

Just embarrassment at the fact that you thought you could ever be happy.

Jane: There's this huge space between us, and it just keeps filling up with all the things we don't say to each other. What's that called?

Counsellor: Marriage.

Voids are a bitch. 

And that's life.

I hate reality.

Maybe it's the monotony of it all, or those little "isms" that supposedly add character but become frustrating knots in your existence.  Maybe it's just because its the same thing you go through every day.  Just trying to get by.  Surviving in no man's land. 

I hate it when people are fake.  I hate lying, even to "protect."  I'd rather know the truth.  And so I hate the reality that most people keep their secrets hidden because they'd rather avoid confrontation.

I hate hair.  It's the bain of my existence.  Really.

I hate it when I stubb my toe, or drop my bag, or am late somewhere because I was trying to help someone out.    Hell, I hate the wind (anyone should if they weigh under 120). 

I hate stairs.  Now, those truly are the bain of my existence.  It's a workout everyday.  I think that's how I can afford to eat so much chocolate, which definitely isn't a bad thing...so maybe stairs are ok.  Is everything subjective?  Maybe so.  But I do hate stairs.  They usually accompany the "I hate my life" syndrome.  Sometimes I imagine that I'm on some sort of quest you know?  It's pushing yourself to your limits?  Fighting for freedom and all that.  Like making it up those 6 flights of stairs will save  the world, or free some innocent people...something. 

In all reality its probably the chocolate in my room that makes me climb those last steps. Real life isn't as exciting as quests and adventures.

People say I have an active imagination.  I guess its true.  I've died, cried, sang, danced, been all over the world.  In some other world.  Heck, I've been to other worlds.  I've been assasinated.  I've been held captive.  I've been able to fly!  No, imagination is more exciting. 

I sit here and watch people walk by and imagine their hidden agendas. I spin complete relationships out of thin air.  I sing music in my head to add to the heightened state of adventure.  I'm running away from something, then all of a sudden I burst through a wall and I'm ballroom dancing.  Swept up by an imaginary figure.  But then again not so imagined at all. Because I feel my embracers strong hands in the frame of a waltz and I dance.  And the people around me dance.  Like everything is fine and I'm supposed to be there. Entranced in the three step melody.  But as always encumbants are tricky, and the crowd is filled with shifty eyes and secret conversationalists stealing glances.  And all of a sudden I'm falling, like a trap door has been opened beneath me.  And I land in a cage. Dark and wet, the humidity of the air carries the taste of mildewy straw, which covers the ground.  Light comes from a torch off in the distance. It's flame adds a singed smell to the overwhelming rotting surroundings.  Its a stage set by mistrust and guilt.  Suspision and the lack of ability ever to really honestly trust.  Locked in by those eyes on the dancefloor.  Watching me prance around, a puppet on a string, forced by another man's hand.  And those eyes keep judging, and the cage keeps getting smaller and smaller.  Until I suffocate, and the whole world goes away.

So what if life is more than what you bargained for?

And what makes life worth living?  If life is just defined by the name on your underwear, or the amount of furniture you own, or how big your house is?  Is that really what life should be about?  About the material things...about looks and fast food and the latest fads.  Is that even worth it, really? 

What about values?  When did life stop being about values?  Love and peace and hate.  This digital age has removed all of the emotion.  Its like every day goes by and we worry all the time about what we are wearing, what to say.  I guess its just like you want to get in a fight to feel something.

It pisses me off.

I can't help it.  I can't resist.  Maybe it's the mood.  That feeling.   A secret moment of perfection.  Inner troubles flowing with the lyrics, outer flaws erased by the beat. 

Music makes me feel alive.  Today I listened to my random radio station, music of all sorts.  Shakira first caught my attention.  As I sat in my chair my hips began to sway to her music and i was out of my seat.  Hands running up and down my body, feeling the lines from hip to breasts to the back of my kneck to through my hair and into the air.  Enveloped in the latin lyrics, hips moving with the hispanic torture.  Then Chariot, Gavin Degraws slower love melody.  Now im hugging myself, a lonely loving embrace rocking on my toes, two steps for every beat.  Maybe inner strength, smiling at the little "isms" he mentions in is song.  And then the spill canvas, drowning.  Maybe fitting for the mood.  Singing the lyrics.  Back to spanish.  Quick and cuban.  Amazing. 

I love that feeling.  Music.  Moving, dancing, flowing.  Just being.

Sometimes you just have to work through the knots.  Its not easy, and things don't always work out exactly like you'd want them to.  But the only the only way to get over things is to push and push and just keep going. 

It breaks my heart to think that....life may not turn out. 

But I'm feeling a lot better now.  When you love someone, its not just about this and that, things happenings.  Its about life.  About being in the moment and just feeling.  Love, is the culmination of emotion when all you want to do is say something, but you cant. Not even being able to speak.   When all you want is to be hugged or smiled at or genuinly cared for.  Love is eternal confusion.  It's clarity.

I cant say how things are going to workout.  But I hope they do.

Today I'm numb.  I walk and it's almost mechanical.  My eyes lose focus and I just don't feel.  And I just keep walking.  Down a hallway, recognizing a slow warmth shining in through the windows--windows so far out of my reach.  And people walk by and without choice I am not cognizant of their faces.  Literally, I am numb.  

Oh, Life.

It's been a while. 

yes, I'm alive.

Some things just don't go away.  Thats the problem with letting someone in.  They don't treat you with a smile, they just try and make you better they try to come up with some end it all solution.  Things don't just go away.  I need someone to be strong, with a face of happiness, just there waiting...checking...but just being there.  I don't need to be criticized right now.  I've got enough critics inside my head.

A dream: Skin and chocolate. 

My worldly comforts live and breath and I take them in.  Evaluate them and swallow them to keep me sane. 

Chocolate is the effervecent, lasting cure.  It is my breath, my emotion.  My sweet cover up for an emotional letdown.  And you come to me and you say all the right words.  Just as you should.  And I'm happy.  But none of that really matters.  You with your "arrogant" but lovalbly driven imperfections.  You intrigue me.  And so from desperateness I go to contentedness and love the space of emotional freedom I can enjoy.   And i night I lie in your arms, cheek upon your smooth chest and I know you wont hurt me.  And its the best feeling in the world.  Emptiness doesnt surround me when you leave.  Comfortable goodbyes hold together the world.  And when you are gone.  When your other loves call I go about my day and I eat chocolate to sooth any qualms I might have with my soul.  But its not needed.  Because you came to say hello, or squeeze my arm in passing, and thats all I need.  All I need to know I'm on your mind.  And I smile again, almost girlish, wrapped up in the give and take of acceptance.  Its not love, but I wouldnt expect it to be.  Its friendship on a grand scale.  Serious, but playful.  And I haven't cried in days.  Not hardened but happy.  I'm enclosed in that feeling, my skin against yours and I know that this just might work out.

I'm falling apart. Anger can only hold you together for so long.

Because in the end you accomplished your goal.  Congratulations.

I feel worthless.  Because you want her, and I know in every way she isn't better than me.  She is naive at best.  Ridiculously thoughtless and inconsiderate.  And you egg it on.  She doesn't even know you.  What kind of a relationship is that?  How can you want to continue something that you so obviously didnt enjoy? 

But then again I have to think about who you are.  Who are you?  Aparently someone that marvels at the submissive, "I accept you the way you are," sort of girl.  Can't take someone with personality.  I don't know her.  But from what I've seen I don't like her.  But she wants you.  She does.  And thats all you need. 

So take her.  Take her and leave.  You wanted to anyway, this is your opportunity.  Go save faith with her, get married, and have a wonderfull life together full of lies and deceit.  You both are great roll models, so I assume you'll be even better parents. 

And me.  What do I do?  I'm dead already so you don't have to worry. 

I dream of dying a slow death and fading into the darkness.  Hapiness.  Not because of you, but because of who I am. 

 What makes life worth living if the one person you have trusted in your entire life turns out to be an entire lie?
